entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Richmond Hill
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:16 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Buttonville Municipal Airport 08:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: E 16 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning this morning and ending this afternoon then 60 percent chance of drizzle late this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late this afternoon. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Fog patches dissipating before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
